import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ViewportScroller } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-wollo-scr', templateUrl: './wollo-scr.component.html', styleUrls: ['./wollo-scr.component.css'] }) export class WolloSCRComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private viewPortScroller: ViewportScroller) { } ngOnInit(): void { } public onClick(elementId: string): void{ this.viewPortScroller.scrollToAnchor(elementId); } }
